channel.title: Staff Zone
channel.description:
Hi,
How do I add Objects to Staff Zone? E.G, Shops, Maybe a chest, & more.
I am running my Server on a Team Torva Source. (TorvaPKz Basically.)
Help please.
Don't comment if you have nothing to say that can help me add them.
Also, I would like to know how to Take Out/Put in new items in my shops.
As I said before, TorvaPKz Source. Help please.

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

I checked my configs file, and all that popped up were like 5 items that said nothing about shops.

And I have a config.class, but that’s pretty much it except for those shop files that I posted above.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

the way iits facing something… and u shud have u checked ur config file?

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

[quote=“xmonster, post:2, topic:410952”]MakeGlobalObject (absx, absY, idofobject, position 0 1 2 or 3, height)

shops.cfg for shops editing this is basic stuff[/quote]

I don’t have a shops.cfg.

I have a shopassistant.class, shophandler.java, and shopassistant.java …

And I don’t understand the Code, What is position 0 1 2 or 3?

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Zone
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

MakeGlobalObject (absx, absY, idofobject, position 0 1 2 or 3, height)

shops.cfg for shops editing this is basic stuff

Read full topic
